name: Polataa 5
overview: The atoms of Earth got pissed off, because the humans wouldn't stop cleaving them to extract energy. So those little, round and jolly things mutated into dangerous macho-macro-atoms (mamas). The atoms didn't realize though what a totally stupid move that was; all of sudden ANY man with a saw -or a hammer- could cleave the jolly things and build nukeys. Your mission, as an excellent world rescuer, is to dismutate all mamas, and as you may have guessed, the only way to do that is with a bat and ball. The world is counting on you! A bat and ball Breakout\Arkanoid type game with some puzzle elements. Released on Assassins CD4 disk. Game contained a built in editor.
